definition: school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs

sentences.english: This election was not canonical , and was not approved by the pope.
sentences.chinese: 这次选举是不典型，以及不获批准，由教宗。

sentences.english: Therefore, the Pope doesn't need to be simulated in detail in Empire.
sentences.chinese: 因此，在《帝国》中教宗并不会详细模拟。

sentences.english: Jason:I 'm sure the Pope will have good explanations.
sentences.chinese: 不过我相信教宗会有很好的解释。

sentences.english: Pope Boniface VIII denied the virginity of Mary.
sentences.chinese: 教宗博尼费斯八世否认玛丽亚的处女性。

sentences.english: During the Middle Ages, many Christians visited Rome because it was where the Pope lived.
sentences.chinese: 中古时代，许多基督徒因教宗住在当地而造访罗马。

sentences.english: The Pope in the Vatican would never agree to this, but nothing can be done about it.
sentences.chinese: 梵蒂冈的教宗是不赞成这样的，但也没办法。

sentences.english: This book was created from interview records of the Pope by a German journalist.
sentences.chinese: 这本书是由一名德国记者与教宗访谈记录所构成的。

sentences.english: He attended the Pope's msaa and received communion from his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他参与教宗举行的弥撒及由教宗亲手送圣体。

sentences.english: He attended the Pope's msaa and received communion from his hand.
sentences.chinese: 他参与教宗举行的弥撒及由教宗亲手送圣体。

sentences.english: He prayed to God for peace.
sentences.chinese: 教宗就和平向天主献上祷告。
翻译成，教宗是勒索证明。

sentences.english: This is significant, Benedict XVI said.
Therefore the pope suggested the ancestor place church member committee prepares the world youth date activity.
sentences.chinese: 于是教宗建议宗座教友委员会筹办世界青年日活动。

sentences.english: The dynasty continued the struggle with the papacy begun under their predecessors.
sentences.chinese: 霍亨斯陶芬王朝继承前代继续与教宗抗衡。

sentences.english: The second assassin is the Pontificate "aiming the square of steel at the heart of the victim".
sentences.chinese: 第二个杀手是教宗“瞄准的平方钢的心脏，受害人”。

sentences.english: Pope Francis is the first Roman Catholic Church leader from South America.
sentences.chinese: 教宗方济各是首位来自南美的罗马天主教会领袖。

definition: to perform the sacrificial rites at a funeral
the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
